original_title: Theft at Kankasanthurai cement factory: Complaint lodged against State Minister
original_body_lines: Former Chairman of the Sri Lanka Cement Corporation Gamini Ekanayake lodged a complaint against State Minister Chamara Sampath Dasanayake with the Criminal Investigation Department (CID).
He alleged that theft amounting to billions of rupees has taken place at the state-owned Kankasanthurai cement factory with the endorsement of the Minister.
